name: Aqua Plane
description:
Aqua Plane is a classic top-down shooter. Pilot your plane, dodge enemies, and shoot them down to reach a high score. Defeat a boss once and the stage gets faster; defeat a boss again and you move on to the next stage. Endless mode has no bosses, but it features every enemy type and moves at maximum speed, making it a challenge to survive.

Playable in the browser and downloadable for Windows.
